<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 444, 720, 459]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 461, 325, 475]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 478, 465, 492]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 494, 599, 509]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 510, 380, 524]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 543, 255, 557]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 560, 652, 575]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 577, 375, 591]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 593, 905, 622]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 624, 444, 638]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 656, 606, 671]]<|/det|>
